title: EcoPowerHub AI full-color emblem logo asset (Base64 Slice 1 delivery)

requirements.summary: Add the required 1024×1024 transparent PNG logo asset and update asset verification lists so it is tracked by build/runtime checks; prepare Base64 Slice 1 output from the exact PNG payload.
acceptanceCriteria: The delivered content is Base64 text for Slice 1 only (no markdown code fences, no extra whitespace/prefix/suffix characters).
The slice corresponds to the PNG file named exactly `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` with dimensions exactly 1024×1024 and an alpha channel (transparent background).
Slice 1 is provided in a way that can be concatenated with subsequent slices (2–4) in order to successfully decode into a valid PNG file.

file_operations.description: Create the full-color EcoPowerHub AI emblem logo PNG (1024×1024) with transparent background (alpha) matching the futuristic blue/green energy-orb + circuit ring + curved “EcoPowerHub AI” bottom-arc text style. This file must be the exact source for Base64 Slice 1 generation and must be saved at this exact path/filename.
Include `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` (1024×1024) in the required generated asset verification list so the production build check validates its presence and exact dimensions.
Include `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` (1024×1024) in the asset restoration/validation list so local verification catches missing/incorrect logo assets early.
Add `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` (1024×1024) to the documented required asset inventory to keep the generated-assets contract in sync with verification scripts.
Add `/generated/ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` to runtime asset verification lists so the app’s asset accessibility checks include the new logo.
